SA20n1365:2: na sanna cāsanna tathā na cānyathā na jāyate vyeti na cā[nā]vahīyate |
SA20n1365:3: na vardhate nāpi viśudhyate punarviśudhyate tatparamārthalakṣaṇam ||1 ||
SA20n1365:11: na hīyate na ca vardhate saṃkleśavyavadānapakṣayornirodhotpāde tad[thā]vasthatvāt |
SA20n1365:12: na viśudhyati prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt na ca na viśudhyati āgantukopakleśavigamāt |
SA20n1365:15: na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayamātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā |
SA20n1365:16: dvayānna cānyad bhrama eṣata[tū]ditastataśca mokṣo bhramamātrasaṃkṣayaḥ ||2 ||
SA20n1365:23: bhrama eṣa tūtpanno yeyamātmadṛṣṭistasmādeva cātmābhāvonmokṣo'pi bhramamātrasaṃkṣayo veditavyaḥ,
SA20n1365:26: kathaṃ jano vibhramamātrāmāśritaḥ paraiti duḥkhaprakṛtiṃ na saṃtatām |
SA20n1365:27: avedako vedaka eva duḥkhito na duḥkhito dharmamayo na tanmayaḥ ||3 ||
SA20n1365:30: kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ loko bhrāntimātramātmadarśanaṃ niḥśritya satatānubaddhaṃ duḥkhasvabhāvaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ na paśyati |
SA20n1365:36: yadā ca loko bhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyakṣaṃ paśyati taṃ taṃ pratyayaṃ pratītya te te bhāvā bhavantīti |
SA20n1365:37: tatkathametāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śrayate 'nyakāritaṃ darśanādikaṃ na pratītyasamutpannamiti |
SA20n1365:39: śakyaṃ hi nāma tamasā vidyamānamadraṣṭuṃ syānna tvavidyamānaṃ draṣṭhumiti |
SA20n1365:41: ta cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanoriha |
SA20n1365:42: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām ||5 ||
SA20n1365:43: na cāsti saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ kiṃcinnānākaraṇaṃ paramārthavṛttyā nairātmyasya samatayā |
SA20n1365:44: tathāpi janmakṣayānmokṣaprāptirbhavatyeva śubhakarmakāriṇāṃ ye mokṣamārgaṃ bhāvayanti |
SA20n1365:47: saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāramanantapāraṃ jñānasya puṇyasya ca bodhisattvaḥ |
SA20n1365:49: arthānsa vijñāya ca jalpamātrān saṃtiṣṭhate tannibhacittamātre |
SA20n1365:59: ekena saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāratvaṃ dharmacintāsuviniśri[ści]tatvaṃ samādhi[dhiṃ]niśrityabhāvanānmanojalpācca teṣāṃ dharmāṇāmarthaprakhyānāvagamāttatpraveśaṃ darśayati |
SA20n1365:61: dvitīyena manojalpamātrānarthānviditvā tadābhāse cittamātre'vasthānamiyaṃ bodhisattvasya nirvedhabhāgīyāvasthā |
SA20n1365:65: tṛtīyena yathāsau dharmadhātuḥ pratyakṣatāmeti tad darśayati |
SA20n1365:67: cittādanyadālambanaṃ grāhyaṃ nāstītyavagamya buddhyā tasyāpi cittamātrasya nāstitvāvagamanaṃ grāhya[ā]bhāve grāhakābhāvāt |
SA20n1365:69: nāstitvaṃ viditvā dharmadhātāvavasthānamatadgatirgrāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇābhyāṃ rahitaṃ evaṃ dharmadhātuḥ pratyakṣatāmeti |
SA20n1365:71: sadā sarvatra samatānugatenāvikalpajñānabalena yatra tatsamatānugataṃ paratantre svabhāve tadāśrayasya dūrānupraviṣṭasya doṣasaṃcasya dauṣṭhulyalakṣaṇasya mahāgadeneva viṣasya nirasanāt |
SA20n1365:75: buddhavihite sudharme suvyavasthāpite sa paramārthajñānapraviṣṭo bodhisattvaḥ saṃpiṇḍitadharmālambanasya mūlacittasya dharmadhātau matimupanividhāya yā smṛtirūpalabhyate tāṃ sarvāṃ smṛtipravṛttiṃ kalpanāmātrāmavagacchatyevaṃ guṇārṇavasya pāraṃbuddhatvamāśu vrajatītyetatparamārthajñānasya māhātmyam |
